content.rendered:
Strengthening Bonds,
Strengthening The
Nation

India's Largest Poultry
Enterprise & No: 1
Broiler Producer

Incubating Innovations
For India

National Best Employer
award from the World
HRD Congress

Welcome to Suguna Foods

Suguna Foods Pvt. Ltd, India’s leading poultry conglomerate, has grown to become a INR 10,750 crore turnover company, over a period of 35+ years. The company’s core value is its dedication to economic and social development in rural India, and it has currently empowered over 40,000+ farmers from 15,000+ villages across 18 Indian states, rewriting the destiny of thousands of farmers and creating our future entrepreneurs. It mobilizes to be the 'protein leader' and bridges with adept business ideals that strives to build healthier nation to consumers.

Our Business

Our Business

Soya

Our Business

Farms

Our Business

Feeds

Our Business

Processed Food

Story So Far

States Served
1+

Feed mills
1+

HATCHERIES
1+

Growing family of farmers
1K

Be a Part of Suguna Family

Suguna Farmers

Suguna's growth story represents the exceptional farmers' integration scenario.

We always strived hard to always provide our farmers with the best business model and ensured sustainable profitability.

To join our Suguna family and have a mutually beneficial journey.

Enquire Now

Suguna Distributor

Are you driven by a desire to succeed? Come Join Us!

Our Distributors are a significant link in the entire product lifecycle, connecting farmers, the company, and the retailer, all of whom are responsible for delivering best-quality and hygienic products to end customers. Suguna welcomes you to be a member of this huge and successful family during this phase of evolution.

Enquire Now

Suguna Supplier

Is it just doing business? Doing a sustainable business with a long-term partnership with the most reputable poultry brand in the country.

A network of over 40,000 farmers, 3 Million MT of feed supplies, 70 feed mills, and a robust R&D process fulfill the ever-increasing need for quality supplies. If you value great quality and engaging business partnership, look no further, Suguna is the place to be.

Enquire Now

Suguna Delfrez

Welcome to the future. Be part of a retail revolution. Be part of Suguna Delfrez!

Suguna Delfrez is a chain of high-quality, modern futuristic retail stores, operating on a Franchisee model.

The store meets the best standards of cleanliness and food safety. Chicken retailed here is of high quality standards.

Enquire Now

Our brands
